body:
OS: ubuntu 18.04 server
spack version: develop branch head

By reading `spack edit singularity`, I believe that there should be a warning prompt telling the users to run `spack_perms_fix.sh`, which seems to fix some permission issues and necessary for singularity to run by normal user.

However I don't see such warning prompt somehow by `spack install singularity`, which might confuse users when later they find singularity doesn't work as they expected.
